Edith Nuong Faalong bụ onye nta akụkọ Ghana, odee, onye na-ahụ maka nhatanha n'ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye na-elekọta telivishọn ugbu a maka Spotlight, mmemme ihe omume ugbu a na Mx24gh ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na telivisheneng na Ghana.

Nuong si Lawra na Upper West Region nke Ghana, mana a mụrụ ya na Tamale, Northern Region.  Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Aburi Girls Senior High School ma mesịa gaa Mahadum Ghana, Legon ebe ọ gụrụ Economics na Geography.

Faalong bụ onye na-akwado ihe omume ziri ezi na ụlọ omebe iwu nke Ghana ma na-anụ ọkụ n'obi maka ịha nhata na mmepe zuru oke. Ọ na-ekwu maka onwe ya dị ka onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị nke na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'akụkụ niile nke ndụ na mgbalị.
Faalong sonyeere Media General Ghana Limited n'afọ 2017 dị ka onye mgbasa ozi maka 3 FM na TV3

Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na onye nta akụkọ kachasị nta na-akwado Hot Issues, ihe ngosi ihe omume ugbu a na TV3.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi TV3 ma bụrụkwa onye otu nnyocha akwụkwọ akụkọ
A na-ahụ Nuong ka ọ maara nke ọma ma kwuo okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ banyere okwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mba ya.

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, o mere isi akụkọ site na ịrị elu ngwa ngwa ya mgbe obere oge gachara na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana. A malitere ịhụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ekwesiri ilekwasị anya karịsịa mgbe ọrụ ya na Garrett Batty's Freetown nke meriri ya na Actress of the Year (Non-Nigerian) na 2016 Nigeria Entertainment Awards (NEA). O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ usoro TV na ihe nkiri dịka 'Living with Trisha', 'A Northern Affair', 'Broadway', 'Sins Of Our Fathers' na 'Crime in Love', n'etiti ndị ọzọ.
